fields.name: Name singular
fields.auditedDisabledFields: No record activity logging for fields
fields.deleteValuesAfterUnlinkingClassification: Delete attribute values after unlinking classifications
fields.linkAttributesWithClassificationAutomati: Link Attributes with the Classification automatically

confirmations.resetToDefault: Are you sure you want to reset configuration to default?

tooltips.clearDeletedAfterDays: Records for this entity are permanently deleted XX days after the deletion date.
tooltips.autoDeleteAfterDays: Records for this entity are deleted XX days after the date of the last change.
tooltips.disabled: Check if you don't need this entity in your system.
tooltips.statusField: Updates of this field are logged in Activities.
tooltips.deleteWithoutConfirmation: If checked, the individual record is deleted without user confirmation. Deletion of multiple records is still  to be confirmed.
tooltips.modifiedExtendedRelations: Changes in these relations will cause the update of "Modified At" date and time.
tooltips.dragAndDrop: This option activates the hierarchy sort order. This means that no other sorting is possible in hierarchical navigation.
tooltips.unInheritedFields: Values for these fields will not be inherited from the parent item.
tooltips.unInheritedRelations: Relations with these entities will not be inherited from parent item.
tooltips.hasAssignedUser: Enable Assigned User for Access Management.
tooltips.streamDisabled: If checked, no Activities panel is displayed on the Record Details page. You will not be able to add notes.
tooltips.disableActionHistory: If checked, no user actions on the records of this entity will be logged.
tooltips.auditedDisabledFields: Changes in these fields are not displayed as Activity.
tooltips.auditedEnabledRelations: Changes in these relations are displayed as Activity.
tooltips.linkAttributesWithClassificationAutomati: If an attribute is directly linked to a record, and that record is linked to a classification, then the attribute will also be linked to that classification.

exceptions.derivativeFromDerivativeNotSupporting: Derivative entity cannot be created from other derivative entity
exceptions.parentsAndChildrenShouldNotBeInModifiedE: {parents} and {children} should not be both in Relations effecting modification date/time
exceptions.entityAlreadyHasAttributesInUse: Has Attribute param cannot be deactivated. Please, remove all related attributes first.
exceptions.entityHasDirectlyLinkedAttributes: There are already directly linked attributes. Please remove them from records.
exceptions.entityTypeIsNotSuitableForAssociates: This entity type cannot contain the "Has Associates" parameter. Only "Base" and "Hierarchy" are allowed to have it.
